hero.title: Inside the Active
hero.description: Explore the deterministic features that make Mirathi the most advanced succession planning platform, engineered for Kenyan legal reality.

tour.title: Mirathi's Microservices in Action
tour.description: Click through each module to understand the boundaries, responsibilities, and interactions of our Event-Driven Microservices ecosystem.

dashboard_overview.title: Executive Estate Dashboard
dashboard_overview.description: Unified view of your estate’s solvency, family graph, and succession readiness score.
dashboard_overview.detail: A high-level, real-time aggregation of your entire Mirathi profile. Powered by the API Gateway, it combines data from Family and Estate services to give you an instant snapshot of your Net Estate Value and Legal Readiness.

family_builder.title: Kinship Truth Engine
family_builder.description: Visually map all legal and biological relationships, including S.40 polygamous houses.
family_builder.detail: The Family Service allows you to build a precise digital twin of your family tree. It intelligently models complex kinship structures like polygamous houses (S.40 Law of Succession Act) and tracks guardianship, ensuring every rightful beneficiary is accounted for.

document_verification.title: Intelligent Document Vault
document_verification.description: Securely upload, OCR-scan, and verify all critical legal documents (Title Deeds, Death Certificates).
document_verification.detail: Our Document Service acts as your intelligent utility. It securely stores all legal files in an AES-256 encrypted S3 bucket. Advanced OCR extracts key data, and the 'Claim Check' pattern ensures only verified IDs are passed to other services.

asset_inventory.title: Economic Truth Engine
asset_inventory.description: Manage all assets and debts. Real-time solvency calculations enforce S.45 priority.
asset_inventory.detail: The Estate Service provides a deterministic inventory of all assets and liabilities. It dynamically calculates the Net Estate Value and enforces S.45 priority rules. The 'Insolvency Radar' proactively blocks distribution if debts exceed assets.

readiness_assessment.title: Succession Readiness Audit
readiness_assessment.description: Get a real-time compliance score. The system prevents form generation until legal readiness reaches 80%.
readiness_assessment.detail: The Succession Service continuously assesses your readiness for court filing. It runs a 'Context Detection' engine to identify the succession regime (e.g., Islamic, Civil) and prevents form generation if the ReadinessScore is below the legal threshold.

form_generator.title: Automated Court Forms
form_generator.description: Instantly generate compliant P&A 80, P&A 5, and orchestrate digital signing of Form 38 consents.
form_generator.detail: Once your estate is reconciled, the ProbateApplication aggregate automatically generates all necessary court forms (P&A 80, P&A 5). It also orchestrates the digital signing of Family Consents (Form 38), streamlining the filing process.

collaboration.title: Role-Based Collaboration
collaboration.description: Securely collaborate with family, lawyers, and verifiers using strict Role-Based Access Control.
collaboration.detail: Mirathi’s Account Service provides robust Role-Based Access Control (RBAC). Users, Verifiers, and Auditors have strictly defined access policies, ensuring data protection (KDPA 2019) and secure collaboration without compromising sensitive information.

capabilities.title: Engineered for Trust & Compliance
capabilities.description: Mirathi's foundation is built upon strict adherence to Kenyan law and modern, event-driven architectural principles.

intelligence.title: Active Intelligence
intelligence.description: It is not a passive database; it is a rule-based engine.

automation.title: Process Automation
automation.description: Removing human error from the loop.
